text.text: Life is sometimes tough, but you found freedom in getting people's consent, without fighting for it.
People might think that you are able to actually copy people's signatures...
But actually, you are just observant enough to find many leftover signed letters and documents.
There are surely some signatures left in this tavern, look at all these drunk people!
Find as many signatures as you can.
Some of these signatures could be useful.
But many are probably not as worth as thew money people are willing to pay for them.
Earn at least 15 gold, selling signatures!
